scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts,js,json --exec 'npm run build:dev && node' .
scripts.staging: nodemon --watch src -e ts,js,json --exec 'npm run build:staging && node' .
scripts.prod: nodemon --watch src -e ts,js,json --exec 'npm run build:prod && node' .
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run lint && npm run build:dev && gcloud app deploy --project=entur-dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run lint && npm run build:staging && gcloud app deploy --project=entur-staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run lint && npm run build:prod && gcloud app deploy --project=entur-prod
